risks.title: Scope creep
risks.mitigation: Lock MVP; weekly triage; move extras to roadmap.

risks.title: Security oversights
risks.mitigation: Helmet, CSRF, rate-limits, code reviews, tests.

risks.title: Multi-school data leakage
risks.mitigation: Tenant checks in RBAC; program_id filters; tests.

risks.title: Team bandwidth/holidays
risks.mitigation: Plan buffer; align sprints with school calendar.

risks.title: DB migration errors
risks.mitigation: Use Knex migrations + test seeds; backups before deploy.
